application.name: unknown
application.description: It is not clear how this typeface is to be used.

application.name: multi-purpose
application.description: This typeface must do well in all sorts of sizes and media.

application.name: newsprint
application.description: This typeface must work well on rough paper.

application.name: smooth offset printing
application.description: This typeface must work well on smooth paper.

application.name: engraving
application.description: This typeface needs to be engraved into something.

application.name: signage
application.description: This typeface will be used on signage.

application.name: packaging
application.description: This typeface will be used on packaging.

application.name: subtitles on television
application.description: This typeface will be used on television.

application.name: antialiased bitmaps
application.description: This typeface will be used as antialiased bitmaps.

application.name: rubber stamps
application.description: This typeface will be used on rubber stamps.

weight.name: hairline
weight.description: All strokes are as thin as possible.

weight.name: extra light
weight.description: All strokes are light, but not extremely.

weight.name: light
weight.description: All strokes are light, but not extremely.

weight.name: book
weight.description: All strokes are such that they're readable at arms' length.

weight.name: plain
weight.description: All strokes are plain. Not too light, not too heavy.

weight.name: medium
weight.description: All strokes are heavier than normal, not bold.

weight.name: semi bold
weight.description: All strokes are heavier than normal, not bold.
All strokes are heavier than bold.
weight.name: extra bold
black
weight.description: All strokes are as heavy as they can be.

stroke endings.name: straight, no serif
stroke endings.description: The strokes do not end in serifs.

stroke endings.name: rounded, no serif
stroke endings.description: The strokes are rounded at the end.

stroke endings.name: bracketed serif
stroke endings.description: The strokes end in bracketed serifs.

stroke endings.name: asymmetric serif
stroke endings.description: The strokes end in asymmetric serifs.

stroke endings.name: wedge serif
stroke endings.description: The strokes end in triangular serifs.

stroke endings.name: slab serif
stroke endings.description: The strokes end in rectangular serifs.

ascender.name: longer than normal
ascender.description: The ascenders should be longer than normal. But what is normal?

ascender.name: shorter than normal
ascender.description: The ascenders should be shorter than normal. But what is normal?

ascender.name: much shorter than normal
ascender.description: The ascenders should be much shorter than normal. But what is normal?

ascender.name: much longer than normal
ascender.description: The ascenders should be much longer than normal. But what is normal?

ascender.name: none at all
ascender.description: There is no room for ascenders.

construction.name: roman
construction.description: Construct the letters as lowercase romans.

construction.name: italic
construction.description: Construct the letters as cursive italics.

construction.name: caps and smallcaps
construction.description: Construct the letters with an initial capital, then followed by smallcaps.

construction.name: roman + capitals
construction.description: Construct the letters with an initial capital, then followed by lowercase roman.

construction.name: italic + capitals
construction.description: Construct the letters with an initial capital, then followed by lowercase italic.

construction.name: proportional oldstyle figures
construction.description: Old style (non-lining) figures with proportional widths.

construction.name: tabular oldstyle figures
construction.description: Old style (non-lining) figures with tabular widths.

construction.name: smallcaps figures
construction.description: Figures fitting to smallcap size. Add a regular capital to get a sense of the proportions.

stems.name: slightly concave
stems.description: The stems are slightly curved inward. Reversed entasis.

stems.name: visibly concave
stems.description: The stems are visibly curved inward. Reversed entasis.

stems.name: flaring
stems.description: The stems are very much curved inward. Might involve serifs.

stems.name: convex
stems.description: The stems are very much curved outward. Entasis.

special.name: only straight lines
special.description: Use no curves. Curves are overrated.

special.name: curves as octagonals
special.description: Eight segments to make an oval.

special.name: rough contours
special.description: The contours are rought. Should not be that difficult.

special.name: casual
special.description: Displays a casual approach to construction and finish.

special.name: cut as a stencil
special.description: Make sure the contours do not drop out.

special.name: at least 1 ligature
special.description: Two letters must form a ligature.

special.name: at least 2 ligatures
special.description: Two pairs of letters must form a ligature.

special.name: inktraps for white corners
special.description: Open sharp white corners a bit.

special.name: inktraps for black corners
special.description: Prevent sharp black corners from rounding.

special.name: initial and final swashes
special.description: Add unnecessary but pretty frivolities to first and last letters.

contrast type.name: translation
contrast type.description: The contrast produced by a broad nib pen.

contrast type.name: expansion
contrast type.description: The contrast produced by a flexible or pointed nib pen.

contrast type.name: transitional
contrast type.description: A historical mix of broad nib and pointed nib influences.

contrast type.name: between translation and transitional
contrast type.description: A historical mix of broad nib and pointed nib influences.

contrast type.name: between expansion and transitional
contrast type.description: A historical mix of broad nib and pointed nib influences.

contrast type.name: speedball
contrast type.description: Very low contrast as produced by the Speedball pen.

contrast type.name: brush
contrast type.description: Largely translation, but incorporating rotation and pressure.

contrast type.name: can't be determined
contrast type.description: The contrast is rather difficult to identify. That does not mean is has no contrast!

also.name: as a bold
also.description: As defined by the other parameters, but then also some letters as a bold.

also.name: as a hairline
also.description: As defined by the other parameters, but then also some letters as a hairline.

also.name: as a black
also.description: As defined by the other parameters, but then also some letters as a black.

also.name: as reversed contrast
also.description: As defined by the other parameters, but then also some letters with reversed contrast.

also.name: as an italic
also.description: As defined by the other parameters, but then also some italic letters.

also.name: with some smallcaps
also.description: As defined by the other parameters, but then also some smallcaps.

descender.name: longer than normal
descender.description: The descenders should be longer than normal. But what is normal?

descender.name: shorter than normal
descender.description: The descenders should be shorter than normal. But what is normal?

descender.name: much shorter than normal
descender.description: The descenders should be much shorter than normal. But what is normal?

descender.name: none
descender.description: There is no room for descenders.

contrast amount.name: inverted
contrast amount.description: Thicks are thins and thins are thick.

contrast amount.name: slightly inverted
contrast amount.description: Thicks are thins and thins are thick. But try to be subtle.

contrast amount.name: no contrast at all
contrast amount.description: Thick equals thin. There is no contrast, even when you really need it.

contrast amount.name: not visible
contrast amount.description: Thick looks like thin. There appears to be no contrast.

contrast amount.name: some
contrast amount.description: Thicks are similar to thins but you can tell the difference.

contrast amount.name: visible
contrast amount.description: Thicks are visibly thicker than the thins.

contrast amount.name: quite some contrast
contrast amount.description: Thicks are visibly thicker than the thins.

contrast amount.name: a lot
contrast amount.description: Thicks are a lot thicker than the thins.

contrast amount.name: high
contrast amount.description: A lot of difference between the thicks and the thins.

contrast amount.name: very high
contrast amount.description: A lot of difference between the thicks and the thins.

contrast amount.name: extreme
contrast amount.description: The thicks and thins are as different as you can make them.

width.name: compressed
width.description: The overall width is as small as possible.

width.name: extra condensed
width.description: The overall width is really small, almost no room for counters.

width.name: condensed
width.description: The overall width is small, but not uncomfortably so.

width.name: extended
width.description: The overall width is larger than normal. (But what is normal)

width.name: wide
width.description: The overall width is definitely wide.

width.name: very wide
width.description: The overall width is very large.

width.name: extremely wide
width.description: Draw something really wide. Then make it twice as wide again.

width.name: monospaced
width.description: All letters have the same width

width.name: monospaced condensed
width.description: All letters have the same, narrow, width

size.name: phone reading
size.description: Anticipating contemporary web design, the type will be too small. Can the font help?

size.name: laptop reading
size.description: Reading continuous text on a laptop screen.

size.name: wall television reading
size.description: Reading text on a wall mounted television.

size.name: most sizes
size.description: Can't be too specialised, it has to work well on a range of sizes.

variable.name: make optical axis variations
variable.description: Draw variations for normal and smaller sizes.

variable.name: make optical axis variations
variable.description: Draw variations for normal and larger sizes.

variable.name: make optical axis variations
variable.description: Draw variations for smaller and larger sizes.
